entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 2200 metres in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
